definition: to destroy/to spoil/to ruin/to injure/cruel/oppressive/savage/brutal/incomplete/disabled/to remain/to survive/remnant/surplus

sentences.english: The thugs' cruelty is the pet hate of the farmers in the neighbourhood.
sentences.chinese: 附近的農戶對匪徒之殘毒恨之入骨。

sentences.english: This paper reported a rapid detection method for the pesticide residues in the vegetables.
sentences.chinese: 殘毒檢測，是一種快速的高靈敏度的方法。
